desc.name: Member of Fulfilment Services Group (FSG) - Flipkart's supply chain division, currently working on re-architecture, scaling and optimising warehouse and inventory management services
Working on migrating monolithic warehouse management system application into microservices using Domain driven design principles.
Involved in design and development of microservices for the E-Commerce vertical of Quikr : Quikr Bazaar and Zefo
Re-designed and developed Zefo wallet (promotional closed wallet), integrating features like referral bonus and promotional cash-backs
Worked on unifying the warehouse and finance flows of Quikr Bazaar and acquired entity Zefo. Direct cost reduction of 84% achieved
Migrated about 1 Million Zefo users to Quikr platform, and developed single sign-on feature for users in Zefo using Quikr account
Engineered new payment flow for Zefo. Improved the user experience and increased the payment conversion rate by 33%
Developed a custom margin computation system for Quikr and Zefo
Developed various promotional features including Full COD (0 upfront payment) feature, Zero EMI feature, third party warranties etc
Developed a managed marketplace website called Tradub for buying and selling industrial goods and services
Engineered web based tools for sellers for internal operations. Automated process including inventory data categorisation and stock maintenance
Built applications and pipelines to structure stock and revenue data of different manufactures in different categories
Application Developer (IC-1) in Oracle Financial Services Software Limited in the Flexcube Development Group

Associated with the Japan Cluster Support team, the responsibilities included providing implementation support for the core banking software 'Flexcube' which involved development of new enhancements, testing & fixing bugs
